title: Attack
description: Launch a physical assault against a monster or supernatural entity. Roll Combat + Luck to determine damage.

title: Sneak
description: Move silently through the haunted house, avoiding detection by monsters and supernatural entities. Roll Stealth + Luck.

title: Hide
description: Conceal yourself in shadows, behind furniture, or in closets to avoid being discovered by pursuing monsters.

title: Examine
description: Carefully inspect an object, room, or area for clues, traps, or hidden secrets. Roll Supernatural Knowledge + Luck.

title: Banish
description: Attempt to drive away or destroy a supernatural entity using holy symbols, incantations, or blessed items. Roll Sanctity + Supernatural Knowledge.

title: Resist Fear
description: Fight against supernatural terror and maintain your sanity when confronted with horrifying sights or entities. Roll Fear Resistance + Sanctity.

title: Heal
description: Use medical supplies, magic, or supernatural abilities to restore Health points. Effectiveness depends on available resources.

title: Lockpick
description: Attempt to open locked doors, chests, or containers using tools or improvised methods. Roll Stealth + Luck.

title: Communicate
description: Attempt to speak with ghosts, spirits, or other supernatural entities. May reveal information or trigger unexpected consequences.

title: Disarm Trap
description: Carefully neutralize mechanical or magical traps that could cause harm. Roll Supernatural Knowledge + Luck.

title: Perform Ritual
description: Conduct a supernatural ceremony or ritual to achieve specific effects, such as protection, divination, or banishment.

title: Barricade
description: Use furniture, debris, or other objects to block doorways or create barriers against pursuing monsters.

title: Distract
description: Create noise, throw objects, or use other methods to divert a monster's attention away from yourself or allies.

title: Escape
description: Attempt to flee from a dangerous situation or pursuing monster. Success depends on speed, obstacles, and available exits.

title: Identify Monster
description: Study a supernatural entity to determine its type, weaknesses, and abilities. Roll Supernatural Knowledge + Luck.

title: Bless
description: Confer divine protection or enhancement upon yourself, allies, or objects. Provides temporary bonuses against supernatural threats.

title: Summon
description: Attempt to call forth supernatural entities, spirits, or otherworldly beings. Extremely dangerous and unpredictable.

title: Scout
description: Carefully explore ahead to identify threats, traps, or opportunities before the group advances. Roll Stealth + Supernatural Knowledge.
